scripts.setup: npm install && npm run generate-certs && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.generate-certs: mkdir -p certs && openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout certs/key.pem -out certs/cert.pem -sha256 -days 365 -nodes -subj '/CN=localhost' -addext 'subjectAltName=DNS:localhost,IP:127.0.0.1,IP:192.168.29.46'
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
